forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain will fall throughout the day. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers this evening. Snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High around 0C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 32F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low near -10C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 14F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High -4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 24F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around -10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 14F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 24F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning turning to light rain in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with steady light freezing rain overnight. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of freezing drizzle. High around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers will become more widely scattered in the afternoon. High 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered flurries and snow showers. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered flurries and snow showers. Low around 20F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few snow showers scattered about the area in the morning, otherwise a good deal of clouds. High -3C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered flurries and snow showers. High 29F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered flurries and snow showers. Low -6C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 30%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow flurries and snow showers. Low around 20F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 40%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few snow showers early will give way to a mix of wintry precipitation in the afternoon. High -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A wintry mix. High 32F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow and ice expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low near 25F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.
